clean_lens.description: Clean the camera lens to ensure clear photos and videos.

press_button.description: Press the button to take a photo or start/stop video recording.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to guarantee smooth operation.

rotate_toggle_button.description: Rotate the toggle button to switch modes.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure it can rotate freely.

slide_in_slider.description: Slide in the slider to zoom out the camera lens.

slide_out_slider.description: Slide out the slider to zoom in the camera lens.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to guarantee a smooth zoom in/zoom out operation.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the camera body to remove dust or any other particles.

check_camera_status.description: Check the camera status and make sure it's ready to use.

clean_entire_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the lens, button, toggle button, slider, and camera body.

prepare_camera_for_use.description: Prepare the camera for use: press the button, rotate the toggle button, slide in and out the slider, and check the camera status.
